TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MemberAssignment extends System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding

Docs.summary: Represents assignment operation for a field or property of an object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Bind%2A> factory methods to create a MemberAssignment.
A MemberAssignment has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType>.

Docs.summary: Gets the expression to assign to the field or property.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> that represents the value to assign to the field or property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Linq.Expressions.MemberAssignment Update(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression expression) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children. If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
Docs.returns: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
